column8: Perform long term spectrum analysis at selected ground station site(s) to identify interference characteristics in target telemetry frequencies.
Identify required equipment, measurements to be made, and required study length

column7: Ground station site interference analysis, ground station hardware selection
column8: Design and implement receiver system for primary downlink communications with appropriate filtering to improve SINR.

column6: Primary downlink receiver system architecture, identification of open source resources for development

Testing of design with synthesised data and downlink engineering model
column9: Downlink engineering model, Tx capable SDR

column8: Design and implement transmitter system for primary uplink communications with appropriate filtering to improve SINR.
